headline.main: Blatter Quit as Pressures Rapidly Built From All Sides
headline.print_headline: Blatter Quit as Pressures Rapidly Built From All Sides

docs.snippet: “Who got him? Who shot him? What happened between then and now?” asked the English Football Association’s chairman Greg Dyke, a former TV executive as he pondered the downfall of Sepp Blatter, who announced his resignation as FIF...
docs.lead_paragraph: “Who got him? Who shot him? What happened between then and now?” asked the English Football Association’s chairman Greg Dyke, a former TV executive as he pondered the downfall of Sepp Blatter, who announced his resignation as FIFA president on Tuesday.

headline.main: NYRA Board Chairman Taking Leave of Absence
headline.print_headline: NYRA Board Chairman Taking Leave of Absence

docs.snippet: The chairman of the board of the New York Racing Association is taking a leave of absence following allegations that his company provided a "no-show" job to the son of former state Senate leader Dean Skelos....
docs.lead_paragraph: The chairman of the board of the New York Racing Association is taking a leave of absence following allegations that his company provided a "no-show" job to the son of former state Senate leader Dean Skelos.

headline.main: Zobrist's Grand Slam Lifts A's to 5-3 Win Over Tigers
headline.print_headline: Zobrist's Grand Slam Lifts A's to 5-3 Win Over Tigers

docs.snippet: Ben Zobrist's grand slam highlighted a five-run seventh inning for Oakland as the Athletics rallied for a 5-3 victory over the Detroit Tigers on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ben Zobrist's grand slam highlighted a five-run seventh inning for Oakland as the Athletics rallied for a 5-3 victory over the Detroit Tigers on Tuesday night.

headline.main: China May Services PMI Rises to 53.5, New Business Up Most Since 2012
headline.print_headline: China May Services PMI Rises to 53.5, New Business Up Most Since 2012

docs.snippet: Activity in China's services sector accelerated in May as new business rose at the fastest pace in three years, a private survey showed on Wednesday, a rare piece of good news for policymakers struggling to reviving a cooling economy....
docs.lead_paragraph: Activity in China's services sector accelerated in May as new business rose at the fastest pace in three years, a private survey showed on Wednesday, a rare piece of good news for policymakers struggling to reviving a cooling economy.

headline.main: Boston Ends Skid With 1-0 Win Over Twins
headline.print_headline: Boston Ends Skid With 1-0 Win Over Twins

docs.snippet: Clay Buchholz pitched eight innings and got all the run support he needed on Rusney Castillo's RBI single in the seventh as the Boston Red Sox ended a three-game skid with a 1-0 victory over the Minnesota Twins on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Clay Buchholz pitched eight innings and got all the run support he needed on Rusney Castillo's RBI single in the seventh as the Boston Red Sox ended a three-game skid with a 1-0 victory over the Minnesota Twins on Tuesday night.
